text: Aart Staartjes (1 March 1938 â€“ 12 January 2020) was a Dutch actor, director, television presenter and documentary maker. He was born in Nieuwendam, Amsterdam. He is best known for his role as Meneer Aart on Sesamstraat, the Dutch co-production of Sesame Street. Staartjes also presented the yearly arrival of Sinterklaas in the Netherlands. On 10 January 2020, Staartjes was injured in a car accident. Two days later, he died of his injuries in Groningen. He was 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch television actors Category:Dutch television presenters Category:Road accident deaths Category:Actors from Amsterdam
title: Aart Staartjes
